mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_stock_application_in_record ( id, ware_house_id, goods_id,goods_spec_id, count,apply_number,stock_application_id, residual_number, price,create_user_id,create_time,box_num,box_id,enterprise_id,sort, currency ) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.wareHouseId},#{item.goodsId},#{item.goodsSpecId},#{item.count},#{item.applyNumber},#{item.stockApplicationId}, #{item.residualNumber},#{item.price},#{item.createUserId},now(),#{item.boxId},#{item.enterpriseId},#{item.sort}, #{item.currency})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_stock_application_in_record WHERE stock_application_id = #{stockApplicationId} order by sort asc
